subject: AI & Agents
title: Data Drift: When the World Changes
description: One-minute skill: Data Drift: When the World Changes.

hook.text: Your fraud model was trained on 2023 data. In 2025, fraudsters use completely new tactics.

buildup.text: Data drift means the distribution of incoming data shifts away from the training distribution.

discovery.text: Statistical tests (KS test, PSI) detect drift by comparing training and production distributions.

twist.text: Not all drift is harmful. Seasonal patterns cause expected drift that doesn't hurt performance.

climax.text: Monitor drift continuously and trigger retraining when performance drops below a threshold.

punchline.text: The world moves. Your model stays still. Drift fills the gap.

quiz.question: What causes data drift?
options: Production data distribution shifting from training data
